backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing user profiles, admin role control, and CRUD operations for property listings with access checks and blob storage support.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking admin workflow requirements to related frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of many frontend files describing their roles in layout, data, hooks, and components.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_RETRY.md: Instructions for retrying deployment using dfx and pnpm without modifying code.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base configuration defining OKLCH color variables and applying theme tokens for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that loads fonts, favicon, and mounts the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with routes for home, properties, inquiries, and admin pages using SiteLayout as the root.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminManag: Admin interface for granting and revoking admin access using mutations with status handling and input forms.
frontend/src/components/auth/BootstrapAd: Displays guidance for obtaining admin access and shows the user's principal with copy functionality when they are not an admin.
frontend/src/components/auth/HomepageAut: Provides a login/logout button using Internet Identity with automatic error recovery and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/MyPrincipal: Shows the authenticated user's principal ID with a copy-to-clipboard button.
frontend/src/components/BusinessInfoBloc: Card component displaying business name, address, and phone pulled from siteData.
frontend/src/components/home/HeroSection: Renders the homepage hero section with marketing text, contact options, an auth button, and a hero image.
frontend/src/components/inquiries/Inquir: Implements a client-side inquiry form with validation and simulated submission feedback.
Displays a list of inquiries with sender info and message content, or a placeholder when empty.
frontend/src/components/layout/ContactBa: Shows a row of contact and social media buttons in default or compact layout.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Renders the site footer with business info, contact details, hours, and attribution.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Provides the main site header with navigation, business branding, and conditional admin link visibility.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Defines the main site layout with header, footer, and routed content via Outlet.
frontend/src/components/properties/Inlin: Provides an inline form for creating or editing a property, handling images, YouTube URLs, and video uploads.
frontend/src/components/properties/Prope: Displays a property with images, video, and admin actions, supporting inline editing and deletion.
Modal form for adding or editing a property, including image uploads and basic validation.
Image carousel component with navigation and error handling for property images.
Renders a grid of PropertyCard components or an empty-state message when no properties exist.
frontend/src/data/siteData.ts: Defines the Property interface and provides business info, social links, and sample seed properties.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refetching queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminDiagnostics.t: Fetches backend admin diagnostics and environment info using react-query and Internet Identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminManagement.ts: Provides grant and revoke admin mutations with error normalization and query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useChunkedVideoPlayba: Loads and returns a direct video URL from an ExternalBlob with loading and error state.
frontend/src/hooks/useChunkedVideoUpload: Uploads video files by creating ExternalBlob instances with progress tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useInquiries.ts: Stubbed inquiry hook returning an empty list until backend support is restored.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity context, login flow, and identity persistence via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useLocalStorage.ts: Syncs a React state value with localStorage for persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/usePropertyListings.t: Queries and mutates property listings through backend actor methods with error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Checks whether the current identity is an admin using backend isCallerAdmin.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and CSS custom properties for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin dashboard handling authentication, admin checks, diagnostics, and inquiry management with multiple conditional UI states.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Homepage displaying hero section, business highlights, and an inquiry call‑to‑action.
frontend/src/pages/InquiriesPage.tsx: Simple page showing an inquiry form with a title and description.
frontend/src/pages/PropertiesPage.tsx: Property listing and admin management page supporting creation, updating, and deletion of properties.
frontend/src/README-content-transfer.md: Guide explaining how to export business info, properties, and images for migration to Google Sites.
frontend/src/types/index.ts: Defines basic frontend-only types for user profiles and inquiries.
frontend/src/types/propertyVideo.ts: Defines property video type variants and a helper to classify video inputs.
frontend/src/utils/fileToDataUrl.ts: Converts image files to data URLs with type and size validation.
frontend/src/utils/icError.ts: Normalizes IC canister errors into categorized, user-friendly messages.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters with session fallback.
frontend/src/utils/videoFileToDataUrl.ts: Converts video files to data URLs without size limits for chunked uploads.
frontend/src/utils/youtube.ts: Provides utilities to extract YouTube video IDs from multiple URL formats and generate embed URLs.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS with custom colors, typography, container queries, animations, and extended theming.
project_state.json: Defines current project state and pending feature requests for implementing a backend admin list and related frontend management UI.
